message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential worth to you, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,350,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe the product has great potential, but I'm on a tight budget. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?

Bob, I understand you're working within a budget.  While $1,200,000 is a bit too low for me to accept, I'm willing to come down to $1,275,000. This feels like a fair compromise that recognizes the value this product brings.  What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,275,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,250,000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me. Can we meet at this price?
